response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the impact it can have on your business, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at $950,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my return while providing you with an opportunity to acquire such a high-value item at a premium yet reasonable cost. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this product to your organization.", "product_price": 950000}
